design_identity.visual_style: Deep matte blacks, subtle translucent borders, SF Pro-like typography, vivid distinct accents for actions

sections.order_form: lg:col-span-4 flex flex-col gap-4 sticky top-6 h-fit
sections.footer: fixed bottom-0 left-0 right-0 p-4 bg-black/80 backdrop-blur-xl border-t border-white/10 flex justify-between items-center z-50

buttons.primary: bg-[#0A84FF] hover:bg-[#0077ED] text-white rounded-lg h-10 px-4 font-medium transition-all shadow-[0_0_10px_rgba(10,132,255,0.3)]
buttons.secondary: bg-[#2C2C2E] hover:bg-[#3A3A3C] text-white rounded-lg h-10 px-4 font-medium border border-white/5
buttons.ghost: hover:bg-white/10 text-[#86868B] hover:text-white rounded-lg h-10 px-4

inputs.base: bg-[#1C1C1E] border-transparent focus:border-[#0A84FF]/50 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-[#0A84FF] rounded-lg h-11 text-white placeholder:text-[#6E6E73]

accessibility.contrast_check: Ensure #86868B text is not used on very dark backgrounds for essential reading. Use #BFBFBF if needed.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible blue ring for keyboard navigation

instructions_to_main_agent: Ensure 'Manrope' font is imported (from Google Fonts) in index.css.
Maintain strict adherence to the Dutch terminology provided in the problem statement.
Implement the 'Settings Modal' with the PIN '1990' hardcoded in frontend or backend validation.
Do not use gradients for backgrounds, keep it flat and matte.
Ensure the layout is responsive: Stack columns on mobile, side-by-side on desktop.
universal_guidelines: Do not center align the app container.
Use specific transitions (e.g., transition-opacity), not transition-all.
Add data-testid to all interactive elements.
Do not use emoji icons; use Lucide React icons.
